Export Assistance

Connect with experts in your industry or geographic region for individual counseling and best practices in market. Learn of preferential trade programs that reduce the cost of doing business in specific markets. Understand the best way to finance your sales and get paid. Avoid costly regulatory road blocks or barriers and protect your intellectual property.

Collaborate

Connect and collaborate with experts on export topics.

Connect

Assistance

Find products and services to help you export.

Find

Register

Do you know that 96 percent of the world's consumers live outside the borders of the United States? Tapping into that market potential outside our borders secures jobs here and provides stability in our communities.

Register to gain access to a wealth of information, counseling, and resources from multiple U.S. Government agencies.

Register

About Us

Export.gov brings together resources from across the U.S. Government to assist American businesses in planning their international sales strategies and succeed in today’s global marketplace.

Learn more about us by contacting you local export assistance center

   Locate your local support expert by entering your zip code in our search tool.

China Smart Grid Technologies Business Briefing

Nov 4, 2015
